title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Skills: Empathy-Based Microlearning Experience Design for Remote Learning in the Digital Transformation Era

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design strategies to promote behavioral engagement (attendance rates, activity completion) in remote learning environments using an empathy-driven design framework
Learners can create microlearning content that supports cognitive engagement (depth of information processing, critical thinking) in digital learning contexts

Learners can develop activity sequences that simultaneously consider social engagement (feedback exchange, collaboration) and emotional engagement (maintaining learning motivation) in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
